527860.name: PITCH-HIT : DEMO
527860.description:
In PITCH-HIT you can hit and catch your own baseballs, break stuff with baseballs, and fight aliens...with baseballs!? Unlock each new level and try to top your own highs score or the high scores from people around the world with our online leaderboards! Choose how you want to bat with our 3 pitching modes. T-BALL, Pitcher, and Self-Pitch! Visit the SPACE level to experience Basebeall in low gravity! Other levels include HOOPS, DUCKS, CATCH, JUGGLE, DISTANCE and RAMPAGE. Fun for all ages!

SUPER-REAL Physics!
Multiple Levels and Challenges!
Multiple Pitching Modes!
Point based and Survival based levels!
Online Leaderboards for every level!
Works with 1 or 2 controllers!
